US, UK ship investors hit by soaring Red Sea insurance - sourcesWar underwriters have raised the premiums they charge to U.S., British and Israeli firms by as high as 50% for ships transiting the Red Sea and some providers are avoiding such business due to targeting of the vessels by Yemen's Houthis, sources said. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 13:22:47 GMT 6UPLGOHESBPBRAE66BLPLEPGKM https://www.reuters.com/business/us-uk-ship-investors-hit-by-soaring-red-sea-insurance-sources-2024-02-07/Jonathan Saul, Carolyn Cohn商业
Messi plays in Inter Miami match in Tokyo, Hong Kong seethesAfter leaving fans guessing about whether or not he would take to the pitch, Lionel Messi came on in the 60th minute in Inter Miami's friendly match in Tokyo on Wednesday, thrilling locals but angering fans in Hong Kong, where he failed to play at a weekend game. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 12:40:02 GMT UKKAIKHFV5N2RH5YT6MEHX3BKE https://www.reuters.com/sports/soccer/messi-plays-inter-miami-match-tokyo-heels-hong-kong-no-show-2024-02-07/Chang-Ran Kim, Jessie Pang运动的足球
Ant Group quarterly profit falls 92% on year to 24.5 mln yuanChina's Ant Group made net profit of 24.5 million yuan ($3.41 million) in the three months to Sept. 31, down 92% from a year earlier, according to Reuters calculations from Alibaba Group Holding's earnings report released on Thursday. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 12:06:55 GMT X2QBWEYJNNLADAEPXOW5DRPKR4 https://www.reuters.com/technology/ant-group-quarterly-profit-falls-92-year-245-mln-yuan-2024-02-07/Reuters技术
Alibaba boosts share buy back as revenues miss estimatesChina's Alibaba Group Holding on Wednesday missed analysts' estimates for third-quarter revenue, hurt by a weak retail environment and faltering economic recovery in the world's second-largest economy. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 11:34:26 GMT UDR3IBLHVNP4JMUF4DQPYVBIRA https://www.reuters.com/technology/alibaba-misses-quarterly-revenue-estimates-2024-02-07/Casey Hall, Harshita Varghese技术
US set to overtake China as Germany's top trade partner -DIHKThe United States is set to overtake China as Germany's most important trade partner by 2025 at the latest if current trends continue, according to the head of foreign trade at the German Chamber of Industry and Commerce (DIHK). Wed, 07 Feb 2024 11:11:46 GMT Y5ADQOMJ6FPAZANKQWWCHOOAOY https://www.reuters.com/markets/us-set-overtake-china-germanys-top-trade-partner-dihk-2024-02-07/Reuters市场
Petrobras in talks for projects with Gulf, Indian, Chinese firms, CEO saysBrazil's state-run Petrobras is in talks with other national oil companies in China, India and the Middle East, including Kuwait Petroleum and Qatar Energy, to collaborate on energy projects, its chief executive said on Wednesday. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 11:05:21 GMT RZTJ4ZXI5VIBPDT2UI6DGZBIXI https://www.reuters.com/business/energy/petrobras-talks-projects-with-gulf-indian-chinese-firms-ceo-says-2024-02-07/Nidhi Verma商业活力
Morning Bid: Global calm returns, regional banks rumbleA look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan Wed, 07 Feb 2024 11:04:15 GMT WVAQOS3LT5M2PPDH7V5Y7EJYMM https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/global-markets-view-usa-2024-02-07/Reuters市场美国市场
China jettisons securities watchdog head as Beijing battles turmoilChina has ousted the head of its securities watchdog, the official Xinhua news agency said, replacing him with a veteran regulator with a reputation for tough action as policymakers struggle to stabilise the country's stock markets. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 10:21:51 GMT YXM3PB7QT5ORJMFIAGQRH63GVM https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-replaces-head-securities-regulator-amid-market-turmoil-2024-02-07/Samuel Shen, Tom Westbrook世界中国
Taiwan stops new group trips to China amid tourism, air route spatTaiwan told its travel agents on Wednesday to stop organising new group tours to China since Beijing has yet to allow such trips to the island by Chinese tourists and has altered a flight path in the sensitive Taiwan Strait. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 09:34:23 GMT HEQQXJQ7NZL47M76QKVTJLBEIU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/taiwan-stops-new-group-trips-china-amid-tourism-air-route-spat-2024-02-07/Reuters世界亚太地区
German Chancellor Scholz to travel to China in AprilGerman Chancellor Olaf Scholz will travel to China with a business delegation from April 15 to 16, a person involved in the planning told Reuters on Wednesday. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 09:10:47 GMT 3VYODXMSHBJZPCU75KF7A4O3RY https://www.reuters.com/world/german-chancellor-scholz-travel-china-april-faz-2024-02-07/Reuters世界
Swiss foreign minister hopes China can 'give us a hand' in Ukraine peace talksSwiss Foreign Minister Ignazio Cassis said on Wednesday he hoped China would "give us a hand" in Ukraine peace talks, after Switzerland last month agreed to host a global peace summit on Ukraine. Wed, 07 Feb 2024 09:04:01 GMT YGQNKQWXABIEBP77HDDRZBXXBM https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/swiss-foreign-minister-hopes-china-can-give-us-hand-ukraine-peace-talks-2024-02-07/Reuters世界欧洲
